title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Virtanen Pharmaceuticals Agent
author: POI Fights
comment:
When you’re about to kill someone, and they say “Lucky you” to how quickly death will come...

As a suggestion, may I recommend, reconsidering your next action.
One of the few times that Reese is forced to kill someone.
Jim got the robotic CIA operative temperament to a tee.

Intravenously, the LD50 of potassium chloride is about 57.2 mg/kg to 66.7 mg/kg. For an 80 kg man, it would be over 4 g. The bottle had 2 ml of 50 mg/ml solution, total 100 mg, which would be under 1/40 of LD50.
LD50 - a dose which kills 50%.
description: Fight Scene from S01 X 06: The Fix
